websetup¶

bootstrap¶

Setup the SPAM database data

Commands for the first-time setup of SPAM database data.

schema¶

Setup the SPAM database schema.

spam.websetup.schema.setup_schema(command, conf, vars)¶

Commands for the first-time setup of SPAM database schema.
